Previous discussion: #mathlib4 > Special-casing definitions in mathlib: IsSharpMonoid
#26110 by @Yaël Dillies adds the following definition:

abbrev IsSharpMonoid := Subsingleton Mˣ

Summary of previous discussion:

  • previously this was a structure instead of abbrev
  • Bhavik opposed on the basis of the precedent VectorSpace
  • it was since then changed to abbrev
  • a point was brought up that VectorSpace is just a restriction of Module with nothing extra added, whereas in this case Subsingleton Mˣ in all circumstances can be replaced with IsSharpMonoid M with no loss of generality whatsoever.
@Bhavik Mehta do you still oppose this?
